mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.price,ec.cover, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.title AS oneSubject, es2.title AS twoSubject, ecd.description FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 on es1.id=ec.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on es2.id=ec.subject_id WHERE ec.id = #{couresId}
